text.data: Donfan![end1]
Donfan: What is it, Lukia?[end]
Lukia: It's finally been decided...![end]
Donfan: Decided?[end]
Do you perchance mean the new king of Mahal has been decided!?[end]
Lukia: Yeah! Listen! Don't be surprised now![end]
Donfan: Really!?[end]
Donfan: Who...? You don't mean...[end]
I, the pure-hearted and serious Donfan!?[end]
Lukia: No! It's Taicho! Taicho's the king![end]
Lukia: Yeah! It looks like he finally gave in to Gunso's persuasion![end]
Donfan: Ah ha ha! 'Tis just like Taicho to be unable to say no to a person's request![end]
Lukia: Okay, let's go to Mahal Palace! Jeanne is waiting too![end]
Donfan: Oh![end]
Taicho: Gunso... why do you want me to be king?[end]
Gunso: Because you are the only one I can think of as being the new king, Taicho![end]

Taicho: I am the man who could not protect Mahal long ago...
I am not certain if everyone will agree or not...[end]
Gunso: What are you talking about? Taicho! You will always be our leader![end]
Taicho: ......!![end]
Gunso: ...I am truly glad I have followed you this far...[end]
Jeanne: I think so too![end]
Donfan: The pure-hearted and serious Donfan also thinks so![end]
Lukia: Me too![end]
Taicho: Everyone...[end][end]
